content.query:
--If running in serverless sql pool, do not run on master. master db do not support creation of external data source.
-- Step 1
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE YellowTaxi
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/yellow/')
GO

--Step 2
SELECT 
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime), 
    passengerCount, 
    COUNT(*) AS cnt 
FROM 
    OPENROWSET( 
        BULK 'puYear=2018/puMonth=*/*.snappy.parquet', 
        DATA_SOURCE = 'YellowTaxi', 
        FORMAT='PARQUET' 
    ) WITH ( 
        tpepPickupDateTime DATETIME2, 
        passengerCount INT 
    ) AS nyc 
GROUP BY 
    passengerCount, 
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime) 
ORDER BY 
    YEAR(tpepPickupDateTime), 
    passengerCount;
